headline: Brown & Brown Legal Leadership Shift Raises Governance And Risk Questions
summary: Brown & Brown (NYSE:BRO) announced the passing of Chief Legal Officer Robert Mathis. The company has appointed an interim Chief Legal Officer to oversee legal and compliance functions during the transition. The announcement reflects a leadership change in a core corporate governance role. Brown & Brown, a large insurance brokerage and risk management firm, relies heavily on legal oversight given its regulated markets and complex customer relationships. A change in the Chief Legal Officer...
